original_title: Mister Soul: a story about Donny Hathaway
overview: The legendary American soulsinger Donny Hathaway has been seen as an insiration and a genius by many. When he had his bigges succes, he was diagnozed with paranoid schizophrenia. How did he balance his madness and genius?
title: Mister Soul: a story about Donny Hathaway
